title: LF Silver/Gold ++ Active Players Who Are seeking Dynamic Que/ possibly Future Team Together
body: Hey guys Drift Wood Here was Plat mid laner last season currently Gold 4 LOoking For Players Who are LF dyanmic Que and possibly become a team In the future. I am from new zealand and have played league for a fairbit but am still learning and growing as a player. i am seeking Players Who active And willing to play in 5 man Ques or even 4, All roles will be open apart From Mid. If you guys are interested Feel free to add me in game or leave a post on here and i will get back too you. i am also looking for players who willing to communicate and grow as players and become a strong league of legends family together Cheers.

replies.body: Add me Gold 4 (Plat in pre-season) support main, used to play for a semi-pro team IGN: Support Leona.
Add me G4 jg/top main IGN: Dragzneel

add me, adc/jg main g2 was plat
IGN:Banana Chan

Decayed from silv 1 silv 5 after I failed gold promos 3 times haha. Recently played a little and got back to silv 3. I'm a good player, chilled out, i don't flame, if someone on my team is doing bad i don't pester them about it. I simply just look for ways to come back and i usually do so. I'm no longer tilted and when i'm slightly ahead i can usually carry hard. Main- Top, jungle, mid, adc, dont usually support unless i have to.
add after my smurf game with a m ate
